title: Motorola Edge 30 Pro leaked renders reveal stylus support and smart folio case
content:

The post Motorola Edge 30 Pro leaked renders reveal stylus support and smart folio case appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Noted leaker Evan Blass has shared high-quality renders of the Motorola Edge 30 Pro, complete with a stylus and folio case.
